meanings.sent1: The teacher received an augustest award for her dedication to education.
meanings.sent2: The grand castle stood in all its augustest glory, towering over the village.
meanings.sent3: The augustest squirrel in the park was known for its acrobatic skills.
meanings.sent4: Her augustest presence commanded attention wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The augustest mountain peak glistened in the morning sun, a sight to behold.

meanings.sent1: In the history of the kingdom, he was known as the augustest ruler.
meanings.sent2: The augustest of all the paintings in the gallery was a masterpiece by a renowned artist.
meanings.sent3: The augustest of all the cupcakes at the bake sale disappeared in seconds.
meanings.sent4: Among the stars, she shone as the augustest, lighting up the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The augustest of all the trees in the forest was a majestic oak that had stood for centuries.
